name: Pizza Girl VS The Munchers
description:
It's an extremely simple game for a Pizza Jam.

The city's invaded by the monsters of Gluttony called the Munchers! And they're eating and frying everything they can find! It's up for Pizza Girl to save the day... by giving them what they want; food! In the form of delicious Pizza!

CONTROLS

ASWD - Move

J - Fire Pizza
 NOTE: The game's controller compatible.

Song done with DefleMask

Sounds done with Bfxr (Imported from my other project, Iris Knight)
